documents.document: @chrisgeidner We demand more updates, Chris.

@KailiJoy I think more likely than not they comply, but the lack of complete and utter certainty is dangerously startling.
@KailiJoy Kelly will do the right thing, I think. CBP seems to be a bit rogue, so I don’t really know.
@KailiJoy Best case scenario is that Kelly orders CBP to comply and CBP follows his orders.
@KailiJoy Which is quite a dicey situation to be in.
@KailiJoy … the people who have or control the guns want to ensure compliance.
@KailiJoy Presumably at some point Secretary Kelly orders his subordinates to comply. If they don’t, then… it comes down to whether…
